text: Buss may refer to: * Buss (surname), a family name * Buss, the pressing of lips * Herring buss, a small fishing boat * Buss Island, a phantom island in the North Atlantic Ocean * Audio bus, also spelt buss, a signal path which can be used to combine individual audio signal paths together ==See also== * Martin Buß (born 1976), German high jumper * Franz Josef Ritter von Buß (1803–1878), German Roman Catholic jurist, activist and politician * Bus (disambiguation)
title: Buss
